Package de.japi.components

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDrawable
    Abstraction for a element which paints itself.
    AbstractJapi2ValueComponent
    Abstraction of a component displaying integer values in a complex diagram (Japi2SevenSegment, Japi2Led, Japi2Meter) which provides convenience methods for common properties of the subclasses.
    Japi2AboutWindow
    This class is a simple about dialog for the Japi2 Kernel.
    Japi2AlertDialog
    This class provides modal dialogs for the Japi2 Kernel.
    Japi2Button
    Button class to construct Buttons based on JButton, which inherits from JButton.
    Japi2Canvas
    This class is a simple SWING implemenation for Japi2Canvas to match the needs of the original JAPI kernel.
    Japi2CheckBox
    CheckBox class to construct Check Boxes based on JCheckBox.
    Japi2CheckMenuItem
    Japie2CheckMenuItem allowes to construct MenuItems in a CheckBox Menu based on JCheckBoxMenuItem.
    Japi2Choice
    Jap2Choice class to construct drop-down choice boxes.
    Japi2DebugWindow
    Debug window for a Japi2Session.
    Japi2Dialog
    Adapted implementation of JDialog for the Japi2 Kernel.
    Japi2FormattedTextField
    Component that allows the editing of a single line of text with a formatting mask.
    Japi2Frame
    An extended version of the JFrame that adds support for settings Insets since this is required by JAPI.
    Japi2GraphicButton
    Creates a button which displays an image.
    Japi2GraphicLabel
    A display area for a an image.
    Japi2Image
    A simple custom image with the simple mission to prevent the user from calling the graphic's dispose() method.
    Japi2Label
    Japi2Label class to construct a new Lable based on JLabel.
    Japi2Led
    A LED component for SWING.
    Japi2List
    A simple list component.
    Japi2Menu
    Menu class to construct a new Menu on based on JMenu.
    Japi2MenuBar
    MenuBar class to construct a new MenuBar on based on JMenuBar.
    Japi2MenuItem
    Japie2MenuItem allowes to construct MenuItems in a Menu based on JMenuItem.
    Japi2Meter
    This is a SWING component to provide a gauge meter GUI component which is controlled by a single value (sets the pointer).
    Japi2Panel
    Panel class to contruct a Panel based on JPanel.
    Japi2PanelBorder
    A simple custom border implementation to provide the four border types for a JPanel as defined in the JAPI kernel documentation.
    Japi2PopupMenu
    Simple customization of the JPopupMenu to store a Japi2 specific element (the GUI element to use in the Japi Call JAPI_SHOWPOPUP as parent element to display the popup menu properly on this element).
    Japi2PrintJob
    This class is a more sophisticated custom implementation of a Java PrintJob.
    Japi2RadioButton
    RadioButton class to construct Radio Buttons based on JRadioButton, which inherits from AbstractButton.
    Japi2RadioGroup
    RadioGroup class to construct Button Groups based on ButtonGroup.
    Japi2Ruler
    Custom made component to display a horizontal or vertical line as seperator.
    Japi2ScrollPane
    An wrapper for JScrollPane to provide an interface which can be used by the JAPI2 kernel.
    Japi2SevenSegment
    Seven-segment display component for SWING.
    Japi2Slider
    This component wraps a JSlider and adds a further feature: this class implements the Adjustable interface to be fully compatible to the JAPI2 kernel.
    Japi2TextArea
    A multi-line area that displays plain text.
    Japi2TextField
    Component that allows the editing of a single line of text.
    Japi2Window
    An adaption of JWindow for the needs of the Japi2 Kernel.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Japi2PrintJob.Page
    Enum to provide standard page sizes.
